content.text: What's up, what are you up to?
I'm just crocheting some new hats for the cold weather.
That's so cool! I love crocheting, but I'm not very good at it.
Oh, well it's definitely a skill that takes some practice. I've been doing it for a few years now, so I'm pretty good at it.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be good at it, but I've just never been able to get the hang of it.
Well if you ever want to try it again, I'd be happy to teach you some tips!
Thanks, I might just take you up on that!
What do you do for a living?
I'm a librarian, but my passion is playing the violin.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn to play the violin.
It's definitely a fun instrument to play! I've been playing since I was a kid.
That's awesome! Do you play in any orchestras or bands?
I used to play in a few orchestras, but now I mostly just play for fun.
That's still cool! I wish I could play an instrument
